entry.title: graphql-hive/envelop: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
entry.content: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

entry.content: A lightweight embedable PDF viewer.

entry.title: KhaledObaidCubes/tree-structure-utils: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.
entry.content: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.

entry.title: Smartesting/som: SOM.js is a lightweight JavaScript library that detects and analyzes interactive elements on web pages. Ideal for accessibility audits, automated testing, and user interaction tracking. Open-source and easy to use!
entry.content: SOM.js is a lightweight JavaScript library that detects and analyzes interactive elements on web pages. Ideal for accessibility audits, automated testing, and user interaction tracking. Open-source and easy to use!

entry.title: Djolensen/fullstackapp: This is a lightweight full-stack blogging application using Node.js, Express, EJS, and plain HTML/CSS. It features a RESTful API for handling blog posts and a clean, minimal front-end for browsing, creating, editing, and deleting content.
entry.content: This is a lightweight full-stack blogging application using Node.js, Express, EJS, and plain HTML/CSS. It features a RESTful API for handling blog posts and a clean, minimal front-end for browsing, creating, editing, and deleting content.

entry.title: auhgnayuo/js_diff: A lightweight, type-safe, and universal diff/patch library for Arrays, Objects (Record), and Maps. Ideal for data synchronization, state management, collaborative editing, and more.
entry.content: A lightweight, type-safe, and universal diff/patch library for Arrays, Objects (Record), and Maps. Ideal for data synchronization, state management, collaborative editing, and more.

entry.title: Osikoya17/imgresize: ImageResizer API is a lightweight, RESTful API built with Node.js, Express.js, and Multer for handling image uploads, storage, and resizing on the server. Designed for developers who need a fast and easy backend solution to process images, this API enables users to upload an image and receive a resized version with custom dimensions.
entry.content: ImageResizer API is a lightweight, RESTful API built with Node.js, Express.js, and Multer for handling image uploads, storage, and resizing on the server. Designed for developers who need a fast and easy backend solution to process images, this API enables users to upload an image and receive a resized version with custom dimensions.
